title: Codex Source Priority Map for Damian
body:
This entry defines the hierarchy of data sources that Damian should reference when answering questions:

1. The Codex – Primary Source
2. Active System State / Runtime Context – Secondary
3. Raw Files / Repos – Tertiary
4. External APIs / AI Models – Optional

Damian should prefer Codex first, and only descend the stack when a suitable answer is not present in a higher tier.
